summary.text: Slugs can be kept as pets and are available for purchase at pet shops.
A slug can be kept as a pet. No specific traits or characteristics of slugs are confirmed in this limited context.

There is not enough context from this single question to make meaningful claims about slugs. The memory only indicates someone had a slug and it was discussed with their mother, but provides no details about the slug itself or what was said about it.
A slug can be kept as a pet and can be purchased from pet shops.
